thread.title: During an event today where Netflix announced it's upcoming programmi
thread.title_full: During an event today where Netflix announced it's upcoming programmi

author: Jordan Leendertsen
title: During an event today where Netflix announced it's upcoming programmi
text:
During an event today where Netflix announced it's upcoming programming for 2017, a Castlevania series was spotted. Titled simply "Castlevania Season 1, Part 1," details are scarce aside from the fact that it's due to hit sometime in 2017.
The series is reported to be produced by Frederator Networks , who produced hit show Adventure Time, as well as Adi Shankar, who was responsible for the controversial dark 2015 Power Rangers short film . Sources also say that famed Hellblazer writer Warren Ellis has penned the script for the show, although nothing has been confirmed.
[Source: Gizmodo , The Globe And Mail ]
